lines.gurmukhi: ibrh ibEg rogu duKiq huie ibrhnI khq sMdys piQkn pY ausws qy
lines.transliteration_english: Birah Biaog Rogu Doukhati Hui Birahanee , Kahat Sandays Padikan Pai Ousaas Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The to pangs of separation and disunion from her beloved husband, a distressed wife heaves big sighs and sends messages to her beloved husband through the wayfarers.

lines.gurmukhi: dyKh qiRgd join pRym kY pryvw pr kr nwir dyiK ttq Akws qy
lines.transliteration_english: Daykhah Trigad Joni Praym Kai Parayvaa , Par Kar Naari Daykhi Tatat Akaas Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My beloved! Look how a lovelorn pigeon, a species of devious origin, impatiently flies down from high sky to his mate.

lines.gurmukhi: qum qo cqurds ibidAw ky inDwn piRA qiRA n Cfwvhu ibrh irp irp qRws qy
lines.transliteration_english: Toum To Chaturadas Bidiaa Kay Nidhaan Pria! , Tria N Chhadaavahu Birah Rip Rip Traas Tay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My beloved! You are a store-house of all the knowledge; why don't you rid your woman from the pangs of separation?

lines.gurmukhi: crn ibmuK duK qwirkw cmqkwr hyrq ihrwih riv drs pRgws qy ]207]
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Bimoukh Doukh Taarikaa Chamatakaara , Hayrat Hiraahi Ravi Daras Pragaas Tay ?207?

Shabad OS B.translation: The twinkling stars frighten everyone during the dark night, so am I being distressed by the separation from your holy feet. All these distressing twinkling stars will disappear soon as your Sun-like effulgent glimpse become visible. (207)
